nodes.text: Manalin was a rocky planet located in the Joralla system, a part of the Mektrun sector in the Western Reaches portion of the Mid Rim. Manalin occupied the closest orbital position around its sun, the red giant–type star Jaska, and had no moons. The searing-hot planet had a poisonous atmosphere and was considered to have no commercial value.

Manalin was first mentioned in Planets of the Galaxy, Volume One, a 1991 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Joralla system, and therefore Manalin, in grid square L-17.
